name: Shango
title: Yoruba - Shango - Orisha of Thunder, Fire, and Justice
domains: Oba Koso (The King Did Not Hang)
Oba Gbodo Kole (The King Who Climbs to the Roof)
epithets: Oba Koso (The King Did Not Hang)
Oba Gbodo Kole (The King Who Climbs to the Roof)

relationships.mother: torosi (nupe princess) or yemoja in some traditions

description: Also known as Shango (Sango, Xango, Chango). Associated with Oba Koso (The King Did Not Hang), Jakuta (Stone Thrower), Oba Gbodo Kole (The King Who Climbs to the Roof), Alagbara (The Powerful One), Thunder. Known as Oba Koso (The King Did Not Hang). Symbolized by oshe (double-headed axe).
